rule.condition: major.problem in $L.file="true" and not (same(review.detail in $L.file, NULL)) and not (same(review.detail in $L.file, review.detail in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( major.problem in CurrentRecord = "true" AND review.detail in CurrentRecord != NULL AND review.detail in CurrentRecord != review.detail in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Major Problem">major.problem</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Review Detail">review.detail</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Review Detail">review.detail</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Review Detail">review.detail</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation (when ( major.problem in CurrentRecord = "true" AND review.detail in CurrentRecord != NULL AND review.detail in CurrentRecord != review.detail in SavedRecord))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var $ = lib.c.$;\u000avar file = vars.$L_file;\u000avar review = file[\"review.detail\"]; \u000avar _null = system.functions._null;\u000avar bg = vars.$G_bg\u000aif (bg&& !_null(review) ){\u000a}\u000afile[\"review.detail\"][0] = review[0];\u000a$(\"#problemService\").reviewDetail(file, review);"}
